about_the_game:
This DLC pack contains a collection of high-res promotional wallpapers for the Man of the House.
This set includes 27 different wallpapers of the girls that appear in the game, for you to use as your desktop background.
Note: these images are exclusive and can not be found in the game!

Once the DLC has been installed a folder will appear in the games directory with the image assets.

content_descriptors.notes: The contents of this DLC are intended for ADULTS only and may include sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
This DLC pack contains a collection of high-res promotional wallpapers for the Man of the House.
This set includes 27 different wallpapers of the girls that appear in the game, for you to use as your desktop background.
Note: these images are exclusive and can not be found in the game!

Once the DLC has been installed a folder will appear in the games directory with the image assets.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
